titles.title: A bill to require a report on the feasibility and benefits of establishing a supply chain center of excellence.
A bill to require a report on the feasibility and benefits of establishing a supply chain center of excellence.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This bill directs the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to submit to Congress a report on the feasibility and benefits of establishing a supply chain center of excellence in a state in which NASA does not have research center or test facility.
